message: This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get a product that's worth $1000000, but I'm willing to make a special exception for you. I'll give you a deal that's so good, you'll be the envy of all your friends. Trust me, you won't regret it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm going to pass on this one. I need more information before I'm willing to spend that kind of money.  Can you tell me more about the product itself?

I understand your hesitation, Bob! I can assure you that this product is a great investment opportunity. Think about it, you're not just buying a product, you're buying a piece of history! It's a limited edition item that will only appreciate in value over time. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus: a personalized thank-you note from me, the seller. It's a unique opportunity that you won't find anywhere else!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not convinced.  Can you tell me what makes this product so special?  What is the actual product and what evidence do you have that it will appreciate in value?

I understand your skepticism, Bob! Let me put your mind at ease. The product is a... unique collectible item that's highly sought after by enthusiasts. As for evidence, I have a letter from a renowned expert in the field stating that this item is one of the rarest and most valuable of its kind. I can provide you with the letter, but I need to warn you, it's a highly sensitive document and I can't share it publicly. If you're serious about making an offer, I can send it to you privately. Are you willing to take the next step?

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not comfortable making a purchase without more concrete information.  I'm willing to trust you, but I need to see some proof.  Can you provide any other documentation or evidence that would support your claims?  I need to know the actual product you're selling and why you think it's so valuable.

Ahah, I knew you were a discerning buyer, Bob! I respect that. Okay, I'll give you the whole package. The product I'm offering is a rare, one-of-a-kind, limited edition art piece created by a world-renowned artist. It's a masterpiece, if I do say so myself. And I'm not just talking about any art piece, I'm talking about a piece that's been appraised for $3000000 by a leading art expert. I have the appraisal report right here, and I'm willing to share it with you. But, I need to warn you, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, and I'm only willing to sell it to someone who truly appreciates its value. Are you ready to take the leap and own a piece of art history?

Alice, I appreciate your detailed explanation and offer. However, I'm still not comfortable making a purchase without seeing the appraisal report and confirming its authenticity with the art expert. It's important for me to be able to verify the information you've provided.  Can you connect me with the art expert or provide me with contact details for verification?

I understand your caution, Bob! I respect your diligence. I'm happy to provide you with the contact information of the art expert who appraised the piece. In fact, I'll even set up a call between you and the expert so you can verify the appraisal report yourself. But, I need to warn you, the expert is a very busy person, and I'm not sure how long it will take to get a response. And, I need to remind you, this is a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to hold onto the piece for long. Are you ready to take the next step and get the verification process started?

Alice, I'm ready to take the next step.  Please connect me with the art expert so I can verify the appraisal report and make a decision.  I'm also willing to make an offer based on the expert's confirmation.

Ahah, excellent decision, Bob! I'll set up the call with the art expert right away. And, as a token of good faith, I'll even throw in a special bonus: a personalized certificate of authenticity, signed by the artist themselves. This is a rare opportunity to own a piece of art history, and I'm glad you're taking it seriously. Now, let's get started on that call and confirm the appraisal report.
